name: edit_target
description: Choose a specific code symbol to edit, for example a function, method, struct, enum, etc.

name.description: The name of the symbol. If the symbol is a method, include the class name in the typical LSP format. For example golang would be (class).method, java would be class::method

planned_edit.description: A description of the edit that will be made. Diagnose the problem, describe the solution, describe any implications of the solution, be detailed. Explain why.
